name: Hoofield ep 2: Gone Outback
description:
This AdventureJam 2022 release is a brief, rough and buggy preview of the complete game we've designed. The intent is to finish it... eventually.

Only a Windows build is available right now, sorry! We ran out of time or energy to try to get it right for Linux and Mac.

CONTENT WARNING: Explicit language.

This is a sequel to our previous jam game Hoofield.
The game will make more sense if you've played episode 1!

Powerhoof (powerhoof.itch.io) have planned a holiday together to boost their collaborative spirit before their next big game! A nice, relaxing yet adventurous trip to Australia's Red centre. Surely they'll be able to have a good times without any silly complications? Alas, life isn't always that simple, especially in Hoofield...

Art, story, design and scripting by Succulent Bacon (Dan Hansen)
Design, story and scripting by SummerB76 (Amy Tant)
Musical contribution by Donovan Jonk
Testing by shdon (Steven Don), LostTrainDude (Christopher Sacchi) and Kevin @polytely
Sounds found at freesounds.org
Thanks to cgboost.com and Zacharies Reinhardt in particular for their helpful 3D modelling resources

Created using the PowerQuest engine, courtesy of the wonderful folks over at Powerhoof.
Any resemblance to actual events or people is purely coincidental.
